text:
include lines recognaizing restartssl in the same way like startssl

restartssl|sslrestart|restart-SSL)
    $HTTPD -k restart -DSSL
    ERROR=$?
    ;;
creator: pascal@ajm.pl

text:
It's not possible to pass arguments to a running instance of apache, i.e.
`apachectl restart` should be sufficient.

Thanks for using Apache.
